actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to repeal the Emergency Daylight Saving Time Conservation Act of 1973.

summary.text: Repeals the Emergency Daylight Saving Time Energy Conservation Act of 1973, effective at 2 o'clock ante-meridian on the fourth Sunday which occurs after the date of enactment of this Act, except that if such Sunday is in March or April this Act shall take effect at 2 o'clock ante-meridian on the last Sunday of April.

titles.title: A bill to repeal the Emergency Daylight Saving Time Conservation Act of 1973.
